name: Archer
ability1: Gain 2 vp when raiding an outpost
ability2: Swap an opponent's worker with 1 from the village

name: Armourer
ability1: Gain 2 strength when raiding a monastery
ability2: Gain 1 armour

name: Artisan
ability1: 1 vp per opposing merchant / trader at the game's end
ability2: Gain any 1 plunder.  All opponents gain 1 silver

name: Assassin
ability1: Gain 2 strength when raiding with a grey worker
ability2: Add 1 valkyrie to a chosen set of plunder

name: Avenger
ability1: If killed, force an opponent to lose a crew member also
ability2: Force all opponents to lose 1 silver

name: Barbarian
ability1: Gain 2 strength when raiding a fortress
ability2: Take any 1 plunder from an opponent

name: Beggar
ability1: Discard from crew at any time to gain 3 silver
ability2: Gain either 2 cards or 2 provisions

name: Beserker
ability1: If killed in a raid place card back into your hand
ability2: Force an opponent to lose 1 armour

name: Blacksmith
ability1: Gain 1 silver when making an offering with iron
ability2: Lose 2 silver to gain 1 iron

name: Brawler
ability1: Once per raid you may reroll 1 die
ability2: Lose 1 crew member to gain 1 plunder from the supply

name: Brynjar
ability1: Gain 1 strength for every 3 armour you currently hold

name: Cartographer
ability1: Pay 1 less gold when raiding a fortress
ability2: Lose 1 provision to gain 1 gold

name: Champion
ability1: Gain 3 vp at the game's end
ability2: Force all opponents to lose 1 provision

name: Conspirator
ability1: Draw 1 card when losing 1 or more crew during a raid
ability2: Discard cards to draw back an equal amount

name: Farmer
ability1: Gain 1 livestock when making an offering with none
ability2: Lose 1 provision to gain 1 livestock

name: Folke
ability1: Gain 1 strength for all other hired crew members

name: Forager
ability1: Gain 1 additional provision in the mill
ability2: Gain 2 provisions

name: Gatekeeper
ability1: Draw 1 additional card in the gate house
ability2: Draw 3 new cards to your hand

name: Gravedigger
ability1: If killed in a raid gain 1 gold
ability2: Swap 1 hired crew member with a card from your hand

name: Huntsman
ability1: Pay 1 less provision when raiding an outpost
ability2: Gain 1 provision and 1 silver

name: Jeweller
ability1: Gain 1 additional silver in the silversmiwth
ability2: Lose 2 silver to gain 1 gold

name: Jorunn
ability1: Gain 1 strength for every 2 offerings you currently hold

name: Labourer
ability1: Discard from crew at any time to gain 2 provisions
ability2: Lose 1 silver to gain 1 livestock

name: Marauder
ability1: Gain 1 vp when raiding an outpost
ability2: Lose 1 livestock to gain 1 gold

name: Merchant
ability1: Gain 1 additional vp for each livestock at the game's end
ability2: Use any building's action as if your workers were there

name: Mercenary
ability1: If killed in a raid gain 1 vp
ability2: All players must give you 1 silver or 1 provision

name: Ragnhildr
ability1: Gain 1 strength for every 2 valkyrie you have taken

name: Recruiter
ability1: Pay 1 less silver when hiring crew in the barracks
ability2: Hire 1 crew member immediately for only 2 silver

name: Sage
ability1: You may take 1 additional action in the long house
ability2: Move all 3 offering tiles to the bottom of the stack

name: Scout
ability1: Pay 1 less provision when raiding a monastery
ability2: Swap an equal amount of cards with an opponent

name: Shieldmaiden
ability1: Gain 1 vp when raiding a monastery
ability2: Lose 1 livestock to gain 1 iron

name: Thief
ability1: Gain 1 silver after taking a treasury action
ability2: Take any 1 plunder from a chosen harbour

name: Trader
ability1: Gain 1 additional vp for each offerings tile at the game's end
ability2: Make an offering paying 1 less plunder or silver

name: Tyrant
ability1: If killed in a raid count death twice on the valkyrie track
ability2: Gain 1 vp for each opposing hero currently in play

name: Warlord
ability1: Gain 2 vp at the game's end
ability2: Take up to 2 silver from an opponent

name: Warmonger
ability1: Gain 1 vp when raiding a harbour
ability2: Take 1 provision from an opponent
